data.actual_result: Discord still sends the cropped version of the picture
data.expected_result: The picture would be sent as uncropped, like how it looks like in the Photos app
data.short_description: After reverting an image crop, Discord still sends the cropped version of the image
data.steps_to_repro: - Crop a picture in Photos app - Send cropped picture in Discord - Go back to Photos and Revert edit changes on the cropped picture - Send the uncropped picture in Discord
